info.title: Beckn Final Mile Delivery API
info.description: API Spec for Final Mile Delivery

post.description: Select the service and build order. This can be called multiple times. The on_select callback sends an updated quotation everytime the order is updated.

order.description: This is the draft order object containing details of task being carried out like pickup location, drop location and pacakge details

post.description: Initialize an Order. At this stage the BAP should send an updated order object with billing and fulfillment details if necessary
Checkout from an FMD service. Using this action, the FMD Payer should be able to send proof of payment to the FMD service
Fetch the status of an FMD Service
Track an item during an active service

penalty_terms: Delay in payment after due date will incur 10 INR per day of non-payment

post.description: Acknowledge the checkout of a service and send invoice of the FMD service

penalty_terms: Delay in payment after due date will incur 10 INR per day of non-payment

post.description: Fetch the status of a Service

message.description: BPP returns tracking information. For websocket based tracking data please refer to the tracking data object in core

descriptor.short_desc: Cancellation fee of INR 10 will be applied on cancellation after order is placed
Amount will be refunded in case on prepaid orders cancelled from delivery end

penalty_terms: Delay in payment after due date will incur 10 INR per day of non-payment
Delay in payment after due date will incur 10 INR per day of non-payment

post.description: Returns updated service with updated runtime object
